MWC.GenericData

Class WorldArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GenericData.WorldArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class WorldArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a rectangular area in world coordinates, as implemented as in WorldLocation Last registered: $Date: 2006/04/26 12:39:07 $
    See Also:

      • getDistributedLocation

        public final WorldLocation getDistributedLocation(int counter,
                                                  int total)
        convenience method used to produce a distribution of locations within this area. Using the total number of locations, this method will use the counter to calculate ths location of this point
        Parameters:
        counter - - how far we are through the distribution
        total - - the total number we are going to produce
        Returns:
        this location in the distribution
